channel.title: TIMES NOW | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/Timesnow

item.title: In a big development, Times Now has accessed RG Kar Hospital
item.description: In a big development, Times Now has accessed RG Kar Hospital's first two phone calls made to the victim's parents on the fateful night. The accessed call recording has confirmed the 'cover-up' bid, as the hospital authorities told the parents that their daughter has committed 'suicide'. BJP has lashed out at the former principal of RG Kar Hospital and TMC govt over the misleading attempts. Watch to know in detail. #KolkataHorror #DoctorDeath

item.title: Click https://shorturl.at/8U71f || #Paralympics 2024 witne
item.description: Click https://shorturl.at/8U71f || #Paralympics 2024 witnessed an incredible moment of heroism when Indian para taekwondo athlete Aruna Tanwar displayed grit and determination #Paralympics2024

item.title: #WATCH | Massive Biryani Face-Off in Coimbatore: Who Will Ta
item.description: #WATCH | Massive Biryani Face-Off in Coimbatore: Who Will Take Home â‚¹1 Lakh? Coimbatore, Tamil Nadu: Hundreds of food lovers from Kerala and Coimbatore thronged the Boche Food Express train hotel to participate in the Chicken Biryani contest. The management had announced that those who eat 6 plates of Biryani in 30 minutes could win Rs 1 lakh.
